Uses of Class
org.cojen.tupl.DatabaseConfig

Packages that use DatabaseConfig 
Package Description
org.cojen.tupl
See Database to get started with Tupl.

  • Uses of DatabaseConfig in org.cojen.tupl

    Methods in org.cojen.tupl that return DatabaseConfig 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.baseFile​(File file)
    Set the base file name for the database, which must reside in an ordinary file directory.
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.baseFilePath​(String path)
    Set the base file name for the database, which must reside in an ordinary file directory.
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.cachePriming​(boolean priming)
    Enable automatic cache priming, which writes a priming set into a special file when the database is cleanly shutdown.
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.cacheSize​(long size)
    Convenience method which sets the minimum and maximum cache size, overriding the default.
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.checkpointDelayThreshold​(long delay, TimeUnit unit)
    Set the maximum delay before an automatic checkpoint is performed, regardless of the redo log size threshold.
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.checkpointRate​(long rate, TimeUnit unit)
    Set the rate at which checkpoints are automatically performed.
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.checkpointSizeThreshold​(long bytes)
    Set the minimum redo log size required for an automatic checkpoint to actually be performed.
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.clone()  
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.createFilePath​(boolean mkdirs)
    Set true to create directories for the base and data file, if they don't already exist.
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.customHandlers​(Map<String,​? extends CustomHandler> handlers)
    Provide handlers for recovering custom transactional operations.
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.dataFile​(File file)
    Set the data file for the database, which by default resides in the same directory as the base file.
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.dataFiles​(File... files)
    Stripe the database data file across several files, expected to be on separate devices.
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.dataPageArray​(PageArray array)
    Use a custom storage layer instead of the default data file.
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.directPageAccess​(boolean direct)
    Set true to allocate all pages off the Java heap, offering increased performance and reduced garbage collection activity.
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.durabilityMode​(DurabilityMode durabilityMode)
    Set the default transaction durability mode, which is SYNC if not overridden.
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.encrypt​(Crypto crypto)
    Enable full encryption of the data files, transaction logs, snapshots, and cache priming sets.
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.eventListener​(EventListener listener)
    Set a listener which receives notifications of actions being performed by the database.
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.eventListeners​(EventListener... listeners)
    Set multiple listeners which receive notifications of actions being performed by the database.
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.fileFactory​(FileFactory factory)
    Optionally define a custom factory for every file and directory created by the database.
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.lockTimeout​(long timeout, TimeUnit unit)
    Set the default lock acquisition timeout, which is 1 second if not overridden.
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.lockUpgradeRule​(LockUpgradeRule lockUpgradeRule)
    Set the default lock upgrade rule, which is STRICT if not overridden.
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.mapDataFiles​(boolean mapped)
    Enable memory mapping of the data files.
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.maxCacheSize​(long maxBytes)
    Set the maximum cache size, overriding the default.
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.maxCheckpointThreads​(int num)
    Specify the maximum number of threads for performing checkpointing, to speed it up.
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.maxReplicaThreads​(int num)
    If replication is enabled, specify the maximum number of threads to process incoming changes.
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.minCacheSize​(long minBytes)
    Set the minimum cache size, overriding the default.
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.pageSize​(int size)
    Set the page size, which is 4096 bytes by default.
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.replicate​(ReplicationManager manager)
    Enable replication with an explicit ReplicationManager instance.
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.replicate​(ReplicatorConfig config)
    Enable replication using the given configuration.
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.secondaryCacheSize​(long size)
    Set the size of the secondary off-heap cache, which is empty by default.
    DatabaseConfig DatabaseConfig.syncWrites​(boolean fileSync)
    Set true to ensure all writes to the main database file are immediately durable, although not checkpointed.
    Methods in org.cojen.tupl with parameters of type DatabaseConfig 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static Database Database.destroy​(DatabaseConfig config)
    Delete the contents of an existing database, and replace it with an empty one.
    static Database Database.open​(DatabaseConfig config)
    Open a database, creating it if necessary.
    static Database Database.restoreFromSnapshot​(DatabaseConfig config, InputStream in)
    Restore from a snapshot, into the data files defined by the given configuration.
